front.title: Mapping from LWM2M model to CoMI YANG model

abstract.t: This document defines a set of rules to convert a LWM2M xml-based device specification to a YANG MODULE. The invocation of the server executing the converted YANG code makes use of CoMI. The mapping from the original LWM2M URI to the corresponding CoMI URI is presented.Note Discussion and suggestions for improvement are requested, and should be sent to roll@ietf.org.
